text: some breaking news has come in to us
here on outside source it concerns the
World Cup in cats because Richard Conway
our sports correspondent is carrying the
story BBC has learned from FIFA that the
World Cup final in 2022 will take place
on December the 18th remember just a few
weeks ago as a big story when a FIFA
committee recommended that this World
Cup was shifted from the summer to the
winter because of the temperatures in
cata but we didn't have firm dates now
we do December the 18th 2022 is when the
World Cup will take place bear in mind
the big European clubs were decidedly
unhappy their season is going to be
interrupted but FIFA very much
continuing with its plans December the
18th it's probably bit early to put that
in your diary but anyway there you go we
have a date for the World Cup final in 8
years time
